==== logicalAssignment11.ts (2 errors) ====
    let x: string | undefined;
    
    let d: string | undefined;
    d ?? (d = x ?? "x")
    d.length;
      ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'length' does not exist on type 'string'.
    
    let e: string | undefined;
    e ??= x ?? "x"
    e.length
      ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'length' does not exist on type 'string'.
